sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './newpermit.css'; const businessTypes = [ 'COOPERATIVE', 'CORPORATION', 'ONE PERSON CORPORATION', 'PARTNERSHIP', 'SOLE PROPRIETORSHIP', ]; const regions = ['NCR', 'Region I', 'Region II']; // Placeholder const provinces = ['Metro Manila', 'Ilocos Norte']; // Placeholder const cities = ['Quezon City', 'Laoag City']; // Placeholder const barangays = ['Barangay 1', 'Barangay 2']; // Placeholder const officeTypes = [ 'Main Office', 'Branch Office', 'Admin Office Only', 'Warehouse', 'Others', ]; const requirementsList = [ 'Proof of Registration (DTI, SEC, CDA, etc.)', 'Proof of right to use location (Tax Declaration, Lease/MOA, or consent)', 'Location Plan or sketch', 'Barangay Clearance', 'Market Clearance (if stallholder)', 'Photocopy of Occupancy Permit (if newly constructed building)', 'Community Tax Certificate (CEDULA)', 'Actual Photo of Business Establishment (Interior)', 'Actual Photo of Business Establishment (Exterior)', ]; const NewPermit = () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [form, setForm] = useState({ businessType: '', businessName: '', region: '', province: '', city: '', barangay: '', // Step 3 floorArea: '', employeesInArea: '', maleEmployees: '', femaleEmployees: '', vanVehicles: '', truckVehicles: '', motorcycleVehicles: '', nozzleCount: '', weighingScale: '', // Step 4 sameAsBusinessAddress: false, ownPlace: '', lesserName: '', monthlyRental: '', taxIncentives: '', // Step 5 officeType: '', lineOfBusiness: '', products: '', units: '', capitalization: '', // Step 6 requirements: [], businessLineFiles: null, }); const [activities, setActivities] = useState([]); const [activity, setActivity] = useState({ officeType: '', lineOfBusiness: '', products: '', units: '', capitalization: '' }); const [uploadedFiles, setUploadedFiles] = useState([]); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked, files } = e.target; if (type === 'checkbox') { setForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: checked })); } else if (type === 'file') { setUploadedFiles(Array.from(files)); } else { setForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); } }; const handleRadio = (name, value) => setForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); const handleActivityChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setActivity((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const addActivity = () => { setActivities((prev) => [...prev, activity]); setActivity({ officeType: '', lineOfBusiness: '', products: '', units: '', capitalization: '' }); }; const next = () => setStep((s) => s + 1); const prev = () => setStep((s) => s - 1); // Submit form to backend const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); try { // Get token from localStorage (assuming you have authentication) const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); if (!token) { alert('Please login first'); return; } // Prepare permit data const permitData = { business_type: form.businessType, registration_number: form.registrationNo || '', business_name: form.businessName, tax_identification_number: form.tin || '', trade_name: form.tradeName || '', owner_first_name: form.firstName || '', owner_middle_name: form.middleName || '', owner_last_name: form.lastName || '', owner_extension_name: form.extensionName || '', owner_sex: form.sex || '', mail_address: form.mailAddress || '', telephone: form.telephone || '', mobile: form.mobile || '', region_id: 1, // Default to NCR for now province_id: 1, // Default to Metro Manila for now city_id: 1, // Default to Quezon City for now barangay_id: 1, // Default to Barangay 1 for now address_line1: form.addressLine1 || '', zipcode: form.zipcode || '', floor_area: parseFloat(form.floorArea) || 0, employees_in_area: parseInt(form.employeesInArea) || 0, male_employees: parseInt(form.maleEmployees) || 0, female_employees: parseInt(form.femaleEmployees) || 0, van_vehicles: parseInt(form.vanVehicles) || 0, truck_vehicles: parseInt(form.truckVehicles) || 0, motorcycle_vehicles: parseInt(form.motorcycleVehicles) || 0, nozzle_count: parseInt(form.nozzleCount) || 0, weighing_scale_capacity: parseFloat(form.weighingScale) || 0, same_as_business_address: form.sameAsBusinessAddress, own_place: form.ownPlace || '', lesser_name: form.lesserName || '', monthly_rental: parseFloat(form.monthlyRental) || 0, tax_incentives: form.taxIncentives || 'No' }; // Submit permit const permitResponse = await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/permits', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` }, body: JSON.stringify(permitData) }); if (!permitResponse.ok) { const errorData = await permitResponse.json(); throw new Error(errorData.error || 'Failed to create permit'); } const permitResult = await permitResponse.json(); const permitId = permitResult.permit.id; // Submit business activities if (activities.length > 0) { for (const activity of activities) { const activityData = { office_type: activity.officeType, line_of_business: activity.lineOfBusiness, products_services: activity.products, units: parseInt(activity.units) || 0, capitalization: parseFloat(activity.capitalization) || 0 }; await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/permits/${permitId}/activities`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` }, body: JSON.stringify(activityData) }); } } alert('Permit submitted successfully!'); // Reset form or redirect setForm({ businessType: '', businessName: '', region: '', province: '', city: '', barangay: '', floorArea: '', employeesInArea: '', maleEmployees: '', femaleEmployees: '', vanVehicles: '', truckVehicles: '', motorcycleVehicles: '', nozzleCount: '', weighingScale: '', sameAsBusinessAddress: false, ownPlace: '', lesserName: '', monthlyRental: '', taxIncentives: '', officeType: '', lineOfBusiness: '', products: '', units: '', capitalization: '', requirements: [], businessLineFiles: null, }); setActivities([]); setStep(1); } catch (error) { console.error('Submit error:', error); alert(`Error submitting permit: ${error.message}`); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (
{/* Step 1: Business Info & Contact */} {step === 1 && (

*CONTACT INFORMATION
)} {/* Step 2: Business Address */} {step === 2 && (
*Business Address
{/* Google Maps iframe removed as requested */}
)} {/* Step 3: Business Operation */} {step === 3 && (

)} {/* Step 4: Tax Payers Address */} {step === 4 && (

)} {/* Step 5: Business Activity */} {step === 5 && (
*Business Activity
{activities.length > 0 && (
    {activities.map((act, idx) => (
  • {act.officeType} - {act.lineOfBusiness} - {act.products} - {act.units} units - {act.capitalization}
    • ))}
)}
)} {/* Step 6: Business Requirements */} {step === 6 && (
*Business Requirements
*Upload Your Requirements
(Please upload necessary requirements)
    {requirementsList.map((req, idx) =>
  • {req}
    • )}
{uploadedFiles.length > 0 && (
    {uploadedFiles.map((file, idx) => (
  • {file.name}
    • ))}
)}
)}
); }; export default NewPermit;
